Topic.Title: New combat lay out, need opinions.

Posts.EditableText: Hey all, I have just added an idea in my new gamebook, The Eye Of The Storm, but need people to see if it works and if its a good idea, but meanly opinions about it. As you start up the game there is already a link to the end where you will find the layout test, there is also a link at the end of the game. If its a good idea I will use it to make the rest of the game and if people think its a good idea to use it them self, feel free. Here is the game link: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/play/ ... y5m4jtijcw Thank you to everyone who tests it for me.
